StratmasClient.map
Class GridLayer

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.map.GridLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, StratmasEventListener
public class GridLayer
extends Object
implements StratmasEventListener

This class implements the grid of cells over a region defined by Shape objects.

Field Detail

NR_RENDER_SELECTION_NAMES

protected static int NR_RENDER_SELECTION_NAMES
The number of Render Selection names needed by this adapter.

renderSelectionName

protected int renderSelectionName
The render selection name of the grid. This is used in RENDER_SELECTION mode.

displayListUpdated

protected boolean displayListUpdated
Whether the display list is updated since last redraw.

activeCells

protected boolean[] activeCells
Indicator for the active cells in the grid. If a cell covers the actual region it's value is true otherwise it's value is false.

getCircularCellRepresentation

public Shape getCircularCellRepresentation(StratmasClient.map.Cell cell)

Returns:
the circle representing the cell.
